comprehensive_overview: Cellsnp-lite is a variant calling tool for single-cell RNA sequencing data, specifically designed for genotyping and haplotype inference for diploid cells. It allows for accurately detecting single-nucleotide variations, small insertions and deletions, and single-cell genotyping from scRNA-seq data.
core_features:
1. Genotyping of single cells
2. Haplotype inference for diploid cells
3. Detection of single-nucleotide variations (SNVs) and small indels
4. Single-cell RNA sequencing data analysis
5. High accuracy in variant calling
